contentrichtext.text: '''Bor''' may refer to: ==Places== *Bor (or Bowr), a location in [[Afghanistan]] *[[Bor (Tachov District)]], a town in Plzeň Region (Tachov District), Czech Republic *Bor, name of several villages in the [[Czech Republic]] *[[Bor, Russia]], name of several inhabited localities in Russia *[[Bor, Catalonia]], a village in [[Cerdanya (comarca)]], Catalonia, Spain *[[Bor, Serbia]], a town in Serbia **[[Bor Municipality]] **[[Bor District]] *[[Bor County]], in South Sudan *[[Bor, South Sudan]], a city in South Sudan *[[Bor, Sweden]], a village in Sweden *[[Bor, Niğde]], a district center of Niğde Province in Turkey ==Other== *[[Borr]], a god in Norse mythology *[[BoR]], a bill of rights **[[United States Bill of Rights]] *Bor fruit, more commanly known as [[Ber]] *[[Matej Bor]], the pen name of the Slovene poet Vladimir Pavšič (1913 - 1993) *[[Bor rifle]], Polish [[sniper rifle]] ==See also== *[[Bór (disambiguation)]] *[[BOR (disambiguation)]] {{Disambiguation|geo}}
